value.title: How to Build an AI First Bank | Malaysia Banking CxO Roundtable
value.content:
AI is changing banking faster than ever, from how banks detect fraud to how customers interact with apps. In this roundtable moderated by Fintech News Network’s Vincent Fong, top leaders from Malaysia’s digital and incumbent banks discuss how they’re applying AI across every layer of operations and what’s next as agentic AI enters finance. Featuring: [...]
The post How to Build an AI First Bank | Malaysia Banking CxO Roundtable appeared first on Fintech News Indonesia.

value.title: Xendit to Expand into Latin America by 2025, Eyes Further Global Growth
value.content:
Xendit, an Indonesian fintech firm specialising in digital payments infrastructure, plans to expand into Mexico and Colombia by the end of 2025, followed by Chile, Argentina, and Brazil in 2026. The company will compete with regional players such as Uruguay’s Dlocal and Brazil’s EBANX in Latin America’s fragmented payments market. According to Bloomberg, Xendit aims [...]
The post Xendit to Expand into Latin America by 2025, Eyes Further Global Growth appeared first on Fintech News Indonesia.
